actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning May 6, 1973, as "National Historic Preservation Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning May 6, 1973, as "National Historic Preservation Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the calendar week beginning May 6, 1973, as "National Historic Preservation Week".
